DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine pharmacokinetics safety TAK-875 , daily ( QD ) , without glimepiride participant type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) .
DOC.detailed_description: TAK-875 develop Takeda Global Research Development , Inc. adjunct diet exercise improve glycemic control participant T2DM . This study determine whether administration glimepiride alters pharmacokinetics ( PK ) TAK-875 , whether TAK-875 affect PK glimepiride .

Participant single antidiabetic agent ( stable dose least 28 day ) HbA1c ≥6 % ≤9.5 % . Participant combination 2 antidiabetic agent ( stable dos least 28 day ) HbA1c ≥6 % ≤9.0 % . 13 .
